high_descs: turn to the left twice and go to the wall and turn to the right and go the desk chair
turn on the lamp on the desk
pick up the dark mug from the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine a mug by the light of a desk lamp

high_descs: Turn completely around and walk over to the desk that is now on your right.
Turn on the lamp that is on the desk.
Pick up the black mug that is to the right of the gray bowl.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a black mug using the light of a lamp.

high_descs: turn to the left and turn to the left and go forward to the wall and turn to the right and go forward to the desk
turn on the lamp light on the desk
pick up the mug on the desk
anns.task_desc: examine a mug by the light

high_descs: Turn around, walk straight to the wall, turn right to face the desk and walk to the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
Pick up the cup on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a cup with the lamp on.

high_descs: Turn around from facing the bed, walk towards the wall opposite the bed and hang a right and walk to the desk.
Turn on the lamp located at the left rear of the desk top.
Pick up the black mug located to the right of the gray bowl.
anns.task_desc: Go to the desk, turn on the lamp, pick up a mug

high_descs: Turn around and then to the right to find the desk.
Turn on the lamp to the left side of the desk.
Pick up the mug from the back up the desk.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp and pick up a mug.
